com.ragego.engine

Interface GameListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TurnListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScoreCounter

    public interface GameListener
extends TurnListener
    Listener for a Game. This interface is designed to be warned about what's happening in a game. This is useful for the GUI and networking functions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void newStoneAdded(Stone stone)
      Informs a Stone is added on the board.
      void playNode(GameNode node)
      A player ask to play a node.
      void stoneRemoved(Stone stone)
      Informs a Stone is removed from the board.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ragego.engine.TurnListener

        endOfTurn, newTurn, startOfTurn

    • Method Detail

      • newStoneAdded

        void newStoneAdded(Stone stone)
        Informs a Stone is added on the board. This function is called before dead stones are computed. Take care, if an IA edit manually the board, this function could not be call.
        Parameters:
        stone - The stone which was added.

      • stoneRemoved

        void stoneRemoved(Stone stone)
        Informs a Stone is removed from the board. This function is called after the stone has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        stone - The stone which has been removed.

      • playNode

        void playNode(GameNode node)
        A player ask to play a node.
        Parameters:
        node - The node which player wants to play.
